title: Help
body: When I try to open lol it opens then disappears, I cannot find and video in 2017 about it plz help

replies.body: No worries, we can help!  The patcher not opening can be caused by security settings blocking it from doing so.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help restore access.  Restart your PC as well just in case something might have crashed in the background.
I have a Mac and Its opened before, then I redownloaded the whole game again and worked for a day, should i still try to that?
